meanings.sent1: The outflowing of water from the dam was powerful.
meanings.sent2: The outflowing of emotions overwhelmed her.
meanings.sent3: The outflowing of laughter filled the room.
meanings.sent4: The outflowing of creativity knows no bounds.
meanings.sent5: The outflowing of kindness touched everyone's hearts.

meanings.sent1: The outflowing of lava from the volcano was dangerous.
meanings.sent2: The outflowing of ideas from his mind was impressive.
meanings.sent3: The outflowing of colors in the painting was vibrant.
meanings.sent4: The outflowing of music from the concert hall was enchanting.
meanings.sent5: The outflowing of energy from the sun sustains life on Earth.
